attributes.action: Scrap Local Authorities and The Health & Safety Executive forcing Wheely Bins on citizens who do not want them. To Recognise that Wheely Bins are just a dustbin on wheels and do not actually recycle anything
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wheely Bins are a Proven Fire Hazard and a Risk to Elderly, Disabled and Vulnerable Persons. and the use of them each week all over the UK adds considerably to the Carbon Footprint of this Country. They are an eyesore and should be replaced with clear strong plastic bags which everyone can handle.
